# Sakeera Valkanor
## Overview
---
## Connections
Arbitrary Connection To: [[House Valkanor]] ; Sakeera is the Master Merchant of House Valkanor
Privately Pleased Towards: [[Tammy Quint]] ; Master Merchant Sakeera appreciates Tammy's cheerfulness and her ability to pick up information as she wanders the city.
Resident: [[Ajinan]] ; Sakeera lives in Ajinan.
